channel.title: The Stakehouse Sports Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
channel.googleplay:author: Stakehouse Sports
channel.itunes:summary: The Stakehouse Sports Podcast brings you fun and unique discussions about sports predictions generated through crowd wisdom. Rather than relying on one or two experts, we believe that the crowd is wiser in the long run. Each week Paul and Chris review how the crowd performed over the weekend, identify some things that the crowd got really right (and really wrong), and talk to our best predictors to see how they make their predictions.
channel.googleplay:description: The Stakehouse Sports Podcast brings you fun and unique discussions about sports predictions generated through crowd wisdom. Rather than relying on one or two experts, we believe that the crowd is wiser in the long run. Each week Paul and Chris review how the crowd performed over the weekend, identify some things that the crowd got really right (and really wrong), and talk to our best predictors to see how they make their predictions.
channel.description: The Stakehouse Sports Podcast brings you fun and unique discussions about sports predictions generated through crowd wisdom. Rather than relying on one or two experts, we believe that the crowd is wiser in the long run. Each week Paul and Chris review how the crowd performed over the weekend, identify some things that the crowd got really right (and really wrong), and talk to our best predictors to see how they make their predictions.

item.title: Episode 1 - What is Stakehouse Sports?
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.googleplay:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: Paul and Chris discuss the idea behind crowdsourcedscores.com, how crowd wisdom works and why it can be a new, fun way to watch football, as well as how you can compete in our first postseason contest.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul and Chris discuss the idea behind crowdsourcedscores.com, how crowd wisdom works and why it can be a new, fun way to watch football, as well as how you can compete in our first postseason contest.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris discuss the idea behind crowdsourcedscores.com.

item.title: Episode 2 - A Wild Card Weekend CPR
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.googleplay:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: This week we provide our crowd performance review (CPR) during Wild Card Weekend, what went right, and what went wrong, and how the members of the crowd may have had an effect.
item.itunes:subtitle: This week we provide our crowd performance review (CPR) during Wild Card Weekend, what went right, and what went wrong, and how the members of the crowd may have had an effect.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris discuss the crowd wisdom review (CPR) for Wild Card Weekend.

item.title: Episode 3 - Divisional Round CPR
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.googleplay:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: The crowd came in just under .500 in the Divisional Round. Paul and Chris discuss the crowd performance review (CPR) for each game of the second week of the NFL postseason and highlight where the crowd did well and who the best predictors were.
item.itunes:subtitle: The crowd came in just under .500 in the Divisional Round. Paul and Chris discuss the crowd performance review (CPR) for each game of the second week of the NFL postseason and highlight where the crowd did well and who the best predictors were.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris discuss the crowd performance review (CPR) in the 2018 NFL Divisional Round.

item.title: Episode 4 - Conference Championship CPR
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.googleplay:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: The crowd had an excellent conference championship weekend, hitting on 5 of 6 predictions. Paul and Chris discuss the crowd performance review (CPR) for each conference championship game and highlight where the crowd did well and who the best predictors were.
item.itunes:subtitle: The crowd had an excellent conference championship weekend, hitting on 5 of 6 predictions. Paul and Chris discuss the crowd performance review (CPR) for each conference championship game and highlight where the crowd did well and who the best predictors were.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris discuss the crowd performance review (CPR) in the 2018 NFL Conference Championships.

item.title: Episode 5 - Regular Season CPR
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.googleplay:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: Paul and Chris go through all of the highs and lows of the 2017 NFL Regular Season, and we highlight the select few who hit their predictions right on the money.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul and Chris go through all of the highs and lows of the 2017 NFL Regular Season, and we highlight the select few who hit their predictions right on the money.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris go through all of the highs and lows of the 2017 NFL Regular Season.

item.title: Episode 6 - Game 267 CPR
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.googleplay:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: Paul and Chris talk about a riveting final game and announce the big winner of the 2018 NFL Postseason Prediction Challenge.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul and Chris talk about a riveting final game and announce the big winner of the 2018 NFL Postseason Prediction Challenge.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris talk about a riveting final game and announce the big winner of the 2018 NFL Postseason Prediction Challenge.

item.title: 2018 Season - Episode 1 - Kickoff!
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.googleplay:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: Welcome to another NFL season! We're excited to introduce our weekly prediction competition that will add a little more excitement to your NFL weekends.

item.title: 2019 Season - Introducing Stakehouse Sports - Episode 1
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: Paul and Chris are back after a productive summer, and they are excited to announce that Stakehouse Sports is now an app! We talk through all the new features we are releasing and the new ways you can predict and compete!

item.title: 2019 Season - What is Crowd Wisdom? - Episode 2
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: In the second episode of our opening three-part series, Paul and Chris talk about the hidden competitor on Stakehouse Sports: the crowd. We talk through how our predictions generate crowd wisdom, and why we think it can predict value at the sportsbook better than the experts.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul and Chris cover the concept of the Wisdom of the Crowd and how it can help you find value at the sportsbook.
item.itunes:summary: Paul and Chris cover the concept of the Wisdom of the Crowd and how it can help you find value at the sportsbook.

item.title: 2019 Season - Crowd vs. Crowd - Episode 3
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: In the final episode of our opening three-part series, Paul and Chris discuss the competition that really draws people in, and that's about earning bragging rights over your friends and coworkers. We also discuss how you can pit your office pool against competing office pools in a crowd vs. crowd competition.

item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: Chris and is joined by Brian McFadden, the host of the Pigskin Party Podcast, for the second half of a home-and-home series. Brian and Chris talk Game 267 and look ahead to the 2021 season.

item.title: 2020 - Postseason Recap - Episode 9
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: Chris and Paul reconvene for the final time (for now) to wrap up the NFL postseason. Paul is enjoying a pint from San Juan Island Brewing Co while Chris continues to enjoy his Backbeat Bourbon from 3 Howls Distillery. After they cover the postseason - and spend way too much time talking Tom Brady - they look ahead to the 2021 season in which, if nothing else, they hope COVID plays only a minor role if at all.
item.itunes:subtitle: Chris and Paul reconvene for the final time (for now) to wrap up the NFL postseason. item.title: 2021 - Week 7 Recap - Episode 8
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: Chris is flying solo this week with Elk Rider from Heritage Distillery, and he covers two awful barrel wagers, a good supercontest performance, and covers all the games and the crowd's prediction performance. Plus, he welcomes a brand new winner to the Weekly Winner's circle!

item.title: 2021 - Week 8 Recap - Episode 9
item.itunes:author: Stakehouse Sports
item.description: Paul is back and he's brought the whiskey this time. He and Chris toast another strong performance by the crowd while enjoying the Woodinville Whiskey 100% Rye Bourbon. We update the contending teams' authentic records to see who is still for real and who may only be pretending. Finally, we welcome back Mike for his second straight weekly championship.
